characters.name: Grimwald the Brave
characters.description: A fearless warrior with battle-scarred armor and a mighty sword
characters.appearance: A tall, muscular warrior wearing dented plate armor. A massive greatsword hangs from his back.

characters.name: Elara Moonwhisper
characters.description: An elegant elven mage with silver hair and mystical robes
characters.appearance: A graceful elf with flowing silver hair and shimmering blue robes. Her eyes glow with ancient wisdom.

characters.name: Thorin Ironfoot
characters.description: A stout dwarf with a magnificent beard and sturdy mining gear
characters.appearance: A stocky dwarf with a braided crimson beard and heavy iron boots. A pickaxe rests on his shoulder.

characters.name: Zara the Swift
characters.description: A nimble rogue dressed in dark leather with countless hidden daggers
characters.appearance: A lithe figure in black leather armor, face partially obscured by a hood. Daggers glint at her belt.

characters.name: Magnus the Wise
characters.description: An ancient wizard with a long white beard and staff crackling with energy
characters.appearance: An elderly wizard in star-patterned robes, leaning on a gnarled staff that pulses with arcane power.

characters.name: Lyra Brightblade
characters.description: A noble paladin in shining armor wielding a sword of pure light
characters.appearance: A radiant warrior in pristine silver armor. Her sword glows with holy light, and a divine aura surrounds her.

characters.name: Shadow
characters.description: A mysterious figure shrouded in darkness, identity unknown
characters.appearance: A dark silhouette wrapped in shadows. No features can be discerned, only a vague humanoid shape.

characters.name: Finn the Lucky
characters.description: A cheerful halfling with a mischievous grin and lucky coin
characters.appearance: A small, jovial halfling with curly hair and bare feet. He constantly flips a golden coin.

characters.name: Raven Nightshade
characters.description: A dark sorceress with violet eyes and robes of midnight black
characters.appearance: A striking woman in flowing black robes adorned with silver runes. Her violet eyes seem to pierce through reality itself.

characters.name: Boulder
characters.description: A massive half-orc with green skin and tremendous strength
characters.appearance: An imposing half-orc with green-gray skin and tusks. His muscular frame dwarfs most other adventurers.
